text: Kim Cattrall is moving on from the drama surrounding the newest installment of the Sex and The City franchise which executives officially canceled. The actress, 61, recently revealed that she didn ’ t want to reprise her role as Samantha Jones on the HBO series. One commenter wrote, “ @ Kim Cattrall, So I ’ ve seen you doing interviews on ageism yet I see you on Instagram saying you too old to play Samantha? I ’ m so confused. ” As a response, she wrote, “ I ’ ve played “ Sam ” for twenty years. I ’ m moving on and so should you, ” while simultaneously recommending the fan in question to watch her new show called, “ Sensitive Skin, ” which is on Netflix.
